name: Call Of The Wind
description:
Explore a Mythic Ancient Greek world above the clouds, using your wind powers to travel it quickly.

Call of the wind is a platform game where the goal is to complete the level as quickly as possible.

Call of the wind is a 6 weeks student project, in which we had to make a platform game, with modular assets.

The Team : 

Eliot BERTRAND  - Project Manager : https://www.linkedin.com/in/eliot-bertrand-7107811b8/

Robin ARIAS-TUDELA - Level Designer and 3D Artist 

Christophe BOTELLA - UI & UX Designer : https://blaster13.itch.io/

Arnaud DUPUIDS - Technical Game Designer
